Docs.summary: Indicates that a collection type should be processed as being whitespace significant by a XAML processor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `xml:space` is a related concept that influences XAML processing of white space but is orthogonal to the purpose of WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute. For more information, see [Whitespace Processing in XAML](../Topic/Whitespace%20Processing%20in%20XAML.md). In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute is in the System.Xaml assembly. For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](../Topic/Types%20Migrated%20from%20WPF%20to%20System.Xaml.md). ## WPF Usage Notes is an example [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] class where this attribute is applied. ## XAML Text Usage
